#include<iostream>
    #include<cstdio>
    # include<cstring>
    using namespace std;
 
    int main()
    {
        int t;
        char s1[20],s2[20];
 
        scanf("%d",&t);
 
        while(t--)
            {
                scanf("%s%s",&s1,&s2);
 
                if(strstr(s1,s2) == NULL)
                printf("%d\n",0);
                else
                printf("%d\n",1);
        }
        return 0;
    }
